duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain trusting relationships with clients within the finance industry.
Educate clients on the firm's top-down portfolio strategy and important market events.
Review asset allocation and track progress towards clients' long-term financial goals.
Collaborate with internal teams and auxiliary research teams to provide the best service possible.
Gradually build a roster of high-net-worth clients with the support of the sales team.
Report to group manager for navigation of client relationships and personalized career development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience
